verbose_text: Consistent with the prediction that use of PAS2 requires cooperative enhancing activity from CFI and CstF, mutation of either the CFIm25 (mUE) or CstF64 (mDE) binding site markedly reduced PAS2 use in favor of PAS3 in the absence of CELF2 (XREF_FIG).
evidence: mDE) binding site markedly reduced PAS2
